system.sustained:
The Psyker unleashes a wave of force, on a successful Focus Power Test, it can abruptly move a 50kg x Psy Rating object 10m in any direction. If directed at a target, it automatically hits, dealing 1d10 + Psy Rating Impact damage with Primitive and Unstable Qualities, and moves the target 10 metres. Further degrees of success add +1 to number of metres move in either case, attack can also be dodged.
Primitive: Double AP of non-primitive armour target is wearing.
Unstable: On hit, roll 1d10, on a 1 deal half damage, on 2-9 deal normal damage, on a 10 deal double damage
